about_the_game:
After Me Demo is a first-person psychological thriller in the walking simulator genre.

Description:
The main goal of the demo is to convey the atmosphere of the place, reveal part of the story and introduce the player to the basic mechanics with which he will learn the story and solve puzzles in the main game. Read the writing on the wall using ultraviolet light and even shoot zombies to survive.
Explore the basement, listen to every rustle, find objects to get out of the basement. Unlock your memories step by step.



Peculiarities:
- The plot is presented without the use of text;
- The plot is revealed through the actions and memories of the player;
- The main genre of the game is “Walking Simulator”;
- Gameplay is close to realism;
- The soundtrack will plunge you in the atmosphere of the game;
- Use a pistol to complete some puzzles.

content_descriptors.notes:
DESCRIPTION OF CONTENT FOR ADULTS
The developer describes the content as follows:
The game contains realistic depictions of violent scenes that can have a negative impact on the psyche. Some content may be inappropriate for certain age groups.

short_description: The main character of the game is the artist Tom. He wakes up in the basement of his new house and realizes that there is also someone else. Get out of the basement to unravel the mystery of this place.
